description: Detects changes of sensitive and critical files. Monitors files that you don't expect to change without planning on Linux system.
author: @d4ns4n_ (Wuerth-Phoenix)
false_positives: Some false positives are to be expected on user or administrator machines. Apply additional filters as needed.
name: Potential Suspicious Change To Sensitive/Critical Files
query: ((((process.executable:(/.*\/[Cc][Aa][Tt]/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Cc][Hh][Oo]/ OR /.*\/[Gg][Rr][Ee][Pp]/ OR /.*\/[Hh][Ee][Aa][Dd]/ OR /.*\/[Mm][Oo][Rr][Ee]/ OR /.*\/[Tt][Aa][Ii][Ll]/) AND process.command_line:/.*>.*/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\/[Ee][Mm][Aa][Cc][Ss]/ OR /.*\/[Nn][Aa][Nn][Oo]/ OR /.*\/[Ss][Ee][Dd]/ OR /.*\/[Vv][Ii]/ OR /.*\/[Vv][Ii][Mm]/))) AND process.command_line:(/.*\/[Bb][Ii][Nn]\/[Ll][Oo][Gg][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*\/[Bb][Ii][Nn]\/[Pp][Aa][Ss][Ss][Ww][Dd].*/ OR /.*\/[Bb][Oo][Oo][Tt]\/.*/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Tt][Cc]\/\*\.[Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff].*/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Tt][Cc]\/[Cc][Rr][Oo][Nn]\..*/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Tt][Cc]\/[Cc][Rr][Oo][Nn][Tt][Aa][Bb].*/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Tt][Cc]\/[Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Ss].*/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Tt][Cc]\/[Ii][Nn][Ii][Tt]\.[Dd].*/ OR /.*\/[Ee][Tt][Cc]\/[Ss][Uu][Dd][Oo][Ee][Rr][Ss].*/ OR /.*\/[Oo][Pp][Tt]\/[Bb][Ii][Nn]\/.*/ OR /.*\/[Ss][Bb][Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*\/[Uu][Ss][Rr]\/[Bb][Ii][Nn]\/.*/ OR /.*\/[Uu][Ss][Rr]\/[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\/[Bb][Ii][Nn]\/.*/))
